name: GNGK FANGAME PROJECT
description:
This is a prototype project of DAIKAIJU DAIKESSEN a giant monster brawling game, which is inspired by the classic SNK's 'King of the monsters' game.

The GNGK is also a story based on fan comic created by Garayann the creator of Nagoraiar and artist of this project.

Playable character lists

  • Godzilla
  • Nagoraiar
  • Kong
  • Protogiga
  • King Helldra
  • Necronraiar

And more updates will come in the future.
